title: Sândalos
body: Common name for *Mentha aquatica* and a hybrid resulting from the crossing of this species by *M. viridis*. *M. aquatica* is common in the beds of many streams, and both it and the mentioned hybrid (the former M. citrata) are aromatic Labiadas, used, although rarely, in rural medicine. *M. aquatica* is also known by the name of mentastro.
